newsitem.title: USA: Wanderlust Interactive says names Smith CEO.
newsitem.headline: Wanderlust Interactive says names Smith CEO.

text.p: Wanderlust Interactive Inc said on Thursday that Jay Smith III, president of its recently acquired subsidiary, Western Technologies Inc, and its largest shareholder, was elected chief executive officer of Wanderlust.
Catherine Winchester remains president of the company, Wanderlust said in a statement.
The company also said it had implemented a cost reduction program at its New York office operations and reduced the staff level there by more than 50 percent.
Founded in 1994, Wanderlust creates interactive entertainment products.
